ctas.name: Modern Gradient CTA

ctas.name: Split Layout CTA
ctas.description: Two-column CTA with content on left and visual element on right
ctas.template:
import Link from 'next/link' import Image from 'next/image' import { Check, ArrowRight } from 'lucide-react' interface CTAProps { headline: string description: string benefits: string[] ctaText: string ctaHref: string ctaImage: string backgroundColor?: string } export default function CTA({ headline, description, benefits, ctaText, ctaHref, ctaImage, backgroundColor = 'bg-white' }: CTAProps) { return (

{headline}

{description}

    {benefits.map((benefit, index) => (
  • {benefit}
    • ))}
{ctaText}
) }

ctas.name: Newsletter Signup CTA
ctas.description: Email capture CTA with newsletter signup form
ctas.template:
'use client' import { useState } from 'react' import { Mail, Check } from 'lucide-react' interface CTAProps { headline: string description: string benefits: string[] placeholder?: string ctaText?: string privacyText?: string } export default function CTA({ headline, description, benefits, placeholder = 'Enter your email address', ctaText = 'Subscribe Now', privacyText = 'We respect your privacy. Unsubscribe at any time.' }: CTAProps) { const [email, setEmail] = useState('') const [isSubmitted, setIsSubmitted] = useState(false) const handleSubmit = (e: React.FormEvent) => { e.preventDefault() // Handle form submission here setIsSubmitted(true) } return (

{headline}

{description}

    {benefits.map((benefit, index) => (
  • {benefit}
    • ))}
{!isSubmitted ? (
setEmail(e.target.value)} placeholder={placeholder} required className="w-full px-4 py-3 border border-gray-300 rounded-lg focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500 focus:border-transparent" />

{privacyText}

) : (

Thank you!

You've been successfully subscribed.

)}
) }
